headline: Show HN: BraNFT bra NFTs, real world to digital crypto assets
description: Recycle old USED bra into an #NFT. FREE to become a Creator and start minting on the #NEARProtocol (layer one blockchain). Commission #art from #tiktok #instagram #facebook users and receive royalties win or lose. Smart contract royalties to breast health charity orgs. https://twitter.com/branfts https://www.tiktok.com/@bra.nft https://branfts.com
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: BraNFT bra NFTs，现实世界中的数字加密资产
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: BraNFT bra NFTs，現實世界中的數字加密資產
description_zh-Hans: 回收旧的USED文胸，变成#NFT。免费成为创造者并开始在#NEARProtocol（第一层区块链）上铸币。从#tiktok#instagram#facebook用户那里委托#艺术，并获得版税，无论输赢。智能合约版税给乳房健康慈善机构。https://twitter.com/branfts https://www.tiktok.com/@bra.nft https://branfts.com
description_zh-Hant: 回收舊的USED文胸，變成#NFT。免費成為創造者並開始在#NEARProtocol（第一層區塊鏈）上鑄幣。從#tiktok#instagram#facebook用戶那裡委託#藝術，並獲得版稅，無論輸贏。智能合約版稅給乳房健康慈善機構。https://twitter.com/branfts https://www.tiktok.com/@bra.nft https://branfts.com
